answers.answer: I'm with you on that. Sometimes I want to pack my entire kitchen for lunch with me some days.

You just eat healthier.. everyone gets hungry.. you can just have a cup of water before meals so you're full. Also I know I don't want to be one of the woman who eat and eat all day long and gain 60-70 pounds during a pregnancy.. I don't want to get fat. And that always helps me keep my eating under control..and I also know I'm not eating for two. You actually only need an extra 350 calories that's a yogurt and an apple.. so that's all the baby needs to grow and be healthy. And I don't want gestational diabetes.. all these things help me keep my mouth shut lol
It's so hard. I tell myself I can't eat this much , but then I say oh well. And I feel horrible later. Its so hard I don't wanna be over weight.

question: I am having a lot of eating problems. How do you keep the eating under control ladies?
title: Can anyone help me
